item.title: What Are Code Vulnerability Scanning Tools?
item.description: In todayâ€™s digital landscape, security is important. As organisations increasingly rely on software to drive their operations, the risk of cyberattacks has grown. Code vulnerability scanning tools have become essential in the fight to protect sensitive data, maintain operational integrity, and safeguard against breaches. This article explains what code vulnerability scanning tools are, how they work, their importance, and the key features that make them important in modern software development and security.
